Text: Co Cc Tracy After our September close Company Enron Power and Marketing Inc Current SIT Liability Account was off by In April PA Tax was booked to the Franchise Tax Account Out of the only was attributed to Franchise Tax and the remaining was attrebuted to the Pennsylvania Income tax We need to Debit the Current SIT Liability Account for and Credit the Franchise Tax Expense Account for If you have any questions call me at extension X Thanks Facundo Caminos
